name: Firefish
description:
Firefish is a frantic arcade-style game where you melt rocks to free your fire-spirit brethren. Juggle control many fishes at once while outrunning rapidly cooling lava behind you. Find powerups and choose the best fish for each. How long can your school survive? How many firefish can you save?

Controls:
Space: pause
WASD or arrows: move
1-0 or numpad 1-0: select spirit
q: select next spirit
e or numpad period: use powerup

Thanks for playing! Contact me at @snicklodocus or @nedmakesgames. Watch me make games live on Twitch! Thank you!
